item.title: BRADY CORP 10-K
item.description: BRADY CORP, which is in the Miscellaneous Manufacturing Industries [3990] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 01, 2022 had 36235 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 506 instances 2022 - 477 instances 1 - 334 instances stock - 332 instances 2021 - 325 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
